notes.text:
This update for xscreensaver fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-34557: Fixed potential crash and unlock while disconnecting video output with more than 10 monitors (bsc#1186918)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: XScreenSaver 5.45 can be bypassed if the machine has more than ten disconnectable video outputs. A buffer overflow in update_screen_layout() allows an attacker to bypass the standard screen lock authentication mechanism by crashing XScreenSaver. The attacker must physically disconnect many video outputs.
notes.title: CVE description
